origin: ^A Choice No One Will Ever Make

check_mail: ^It's a letter from my cousin! He lives in a very strange country on the other side of the world... What! According to this a strange old scientist guy has convinced him to leave home and try and become a master of some sort of animal fighting ring... he's 12! Looks like he got a cute pet though.

not_my_mail_box: ^My mail box isn't on this side.

b: ^ There's nothing left to search you monster
^Check other peoples mail... are you sure? Isn't that a crime?

do_it: ^Okay fine *shuffle* it's a bunch of bills and cards for someone's birthday. No money. I hope you feel good about yourself.
relief: ^Wow close one, really wouldn't to make such a moral dip this early.

the_void_book: ^It's a very spooky book, to go with this very spooky room, it reads: "Maybe later this will be a puzzle room, but for right now... Would You Kindly Activate the Ritual and Become A Slime Wizard?"

do_it: ^Wow look at that! Theres more writing in the book: "Woah I wouldn't have done that. Anyway go drink from that bowl now!"

the_slime_bowl: ^It pulses with power, same as the pillars around, this is crazy. This is the bowl the book said I should drink out of, it's full of a slimey liquid. Should I drink it?

drink: ^Its disgusting, hard to drink, feels very odd like yogurt or something *gulp*... Woah I'm pulsing with power now as well!! Is that a door?
yuck: ^For complex and unknown Game Jam reasons I'm gonna drink it anyway
